title: Beautiful 1920's Home with 1286 Sq. Ft. of Living Space!
posting_body: ["Beautiful 1920's Home with 1286 Sq.", 'Ft. of Living Space!', 'Property Address', '2691 Golden Ave.', '| Long Beach, CA 90806', 'Available: 09/15/2022', 'Offered By', 'Ernst and Haas Management Co.', 'Description', 'A lovely 2 bedroom home loaded with charm!', ' This wonderful single-level home has been well preserved with almost 1400 square feet of living space and a granny flat in the rear.', "The home's interior features a large living room, painted in a bright shade of white and boasting several large windows that overlook the front yard, allowing tons of natural sunlight to wash into the room.", 'There is a formal dining area that connects the living room and the kitchen.', 'The kitchen has been updated, featuring ample cabinets and spacious counters, comes fully equipped with a stove dishwasher, microwave oven, and refrigerator.', 'Adjacent to the kitchen is a laundry room with side-by-side laundry and added storage.', 'There are two spacious bedrooms that share the main bath, with an additional room located in the rear yard that works great as a small guest room, home office, or game room.', 'Other features include a fully fenced rear yard,  gardening service included, central A/C & Heat, & Hardwood floors.', 'Pets considered.', 'For more information on this or any other available property, please contact Ernst & Haas Management at', 'show contact info', ', or visit us online at <URL> and apply today.', 'TO QUALIFY:', '• Credit score must be no less than 600', '• Monthly gross income to qualify must be 2 ½ times the rent', '• We do not accept past evictions, judgments, or collections from a management company or landlord', '• Renter’s Insurance is required.', 'Proof of coverage must be provided upon the signing of your lease.', '*Note - See selection criteria for a detailed list of qualifications on our website at <URL>', 'PLEASE BE AWARE OF RENTAL SCAMS:', 'We caution all applicants to be diligent in researching the legitimacy of any potential rental listing.', 'All deposits, rents, and rental agreements\xa0are ONLY executed at Ernst & Haas Management, 4120 Atlantic Ave., Long Beach, CA.', 'If you are being asked to fill out a third-party application or are being asked to pay cash or send money via an App, Western Union, Money-Gram or Prepaid Visa card,\xa0STOP\xa0these\xa0are signs of rental listing scams used to defraud applicants.', 'Ernst and Haas Management Co.', 'DRE License #01251870', '*ALL INFORMATION DEEMED ACCURATE BUT NOT GUARANTEED.', 'APPLIANCES ARE PROVIDED AS A COURTESY AND ARE NOT MANDATORY TO THE LEASE.', 'TERMS ARE SUBJECT TO CHANGE WITHOUT NOTICE.', 'Amenities', 'Stove', 'Dishwasher', 'Microwave Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Washer/Dryer', 'Gardening Services Paid', '2 Car Detached Garage', 'Central A/C & Heat', 'Small Dogs Ok', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 2BD/1.0BA', 'Square Feet: 1,394', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $3,395.00', 'Available: 09/15/2022', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $3,400.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats not allowed', 'Small dogs allowed']
